abstract: That Ed Whitacre, who rebuilt AT&T from the Ma Bell breakup, now appears to be considering doing the same at General Motors, is troubling on many levels, Breakingviews says.
snippet: That Ed Whitacre, who rebuilt AT&T from the Ma Bell breakup, now appears to be considering doing the same at General Motors, is troubling on many levels, Breakingviews says.
lead_paragraph: Ed Whitacre just can’t seem to help himself.

headline.main: Perils of Finance for a Carmaker
